trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" />.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: Mediante la adición de un delegado de controlador de eventos para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> evento, puede realizar cualquier preprocesamiento adicional requerido o cancelar completamente la consulta de base de datos.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Porque el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> clase se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> (clase), puede cancelar una pendiente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> consulta de base de datos estableciendo el <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propiedad `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede examinar y manipular el <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> colección y otras propiedades de consulta de base de datos antes de ejecutar la consulta mediante el acceso a la <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> objeto expuesto por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: También puede examinar el <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> objeto que se pasa a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> método mediante el acceso a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs> clase se utiliza en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> método para proporcionar acceso a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> consulta de base de datos antes de ejecutarse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control expone muchos eventos que puede controlar para trabajar con los objetos de datos subyacentes en el transcurso de una operación de datos.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente se enumeran los eventos y asociados <xref:System.EventArgs> clases y los delegados de controladores de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: evento

trans-unit.source: EventArgs
trans-unit.target: EventArgs

trans-unit.source: EventHandler
trans-unit.target: EventHandler

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Se produce antes de que se recuperen los datos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Se producen antes de realiza una operación de inserción, actualización o eliminación.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Se producen después de la recuperación de datos, la operación de inserción, actualización o eliminación completa.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object that represents the cancelable <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> query.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> que representa la consulta cancelable de <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> que se ha pasado al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs" /> class, using the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> object and any <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs" />, utilizando el objeto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbCommand" /> especificado y cualquier objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> que se haya pasado al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />.

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: El `inputParameters` parámetro es un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> colección de pares de nombre/valor que coinciden con los de la firma del método y se pasan por referencia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> pasado al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object, or <see langword="null" /> if no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object is specified during <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs" /> creation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> o <see langword="null" /> si no se especifica ningún objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> durante la creación de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Puede examinar la <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> del objeto para determinar si la ordenación, paginación, o que se solicita un recuento de filas como parte de la operación de recuperación de datos.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Controles enlazados a datos utilizan el <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> clase para solicitar que el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> realice operaciones adicionales relacionadas con datos en un conjunto de resultados, como ordenar los datos o devolver un subconjunto específico de datos.

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Estas operaciones relacionadas con datos se enumeran por la <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
